short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Having trouble understanding METAR reports? With METAR decoder, you can figure out what your report says instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Having trouble understanding METAR reports? With METAR decoder, you can figure out what your report says instantly!

This new tool from FlightSim Ninja allows simulator pilots with less experience to forget the stress of not being able to easily and quickly understand the information in METAR reports, which can make or break a flight.
